00042     [Serializable]
00043     public class Matrix :
00044         IMatrix<double>,
00045         ICloneable
00046     {
00047 
00048         int _rowCount;
00049         int _columnCount;
00050 
00054         double[][] _data;
00055 
00059         public int RowCount
00060         {
00061             get { return _rowCount; }
00062         }
00063 
00067         public int ColumnCount
00068         {
00069             get { return _columnCount; }
00070         }
00071 
00078         public double this[int i, int j]
00079         {
00080             get
00081             {
00082                 return _data[i][j];
00083             }
00084 
00085             set
00086             {
00087                 _data[i][j] = value;
00088 
00089                 // NOTE (cdr, 2008-03-11): The folloing line is cheap,
00090                 // but still expensive if this setter is called
00091                 // a lot of times.
00092                 // - We should recommend out users to build the internal
00093                 //   jagged array first and then create the matrix for it;
00094                 //   or to get the internal double[][] handle.
00095                 // - Consider to omit it here and make the users call
00096                 //   ResetComputations() after they finished chaniging the matrix.
00097                 ResetOnDemandComputations();
00098             }
00099         }
00100 
00101         OnDemandComputation<LUDecomposition> _luDecompositionOnDemand;
00102         OnDemandComputation<QRDecomposition> _qrDecompositionOnDemand;
00103         OnDemandComputation<CholeskyDecomposition> _choleskyDecompositionOnDemand;
00104         OnDemandComputation<SingularValueDecomposition> _singularValueDecompositionOnDemand;
00105         OnDemandComputation<EigenvalueDecomposition> _eigenValueDecompositionOnDemand;
00106         OnDemandComputation<double> _traceOnDemand;

00115         public
00116         Matrix(
00117             int m,
00118             int n
00119             )
00120         {
00121             _data = CreateMatrixData(m, n);
00122             _rowCount = m;
00123             _columnCount = n;
00124 
00125             InitOnDemandComputations();
00126         }
00127 
00133         public
00134         Matrix(
00135             int m,
00136             double s
00137             )
00138         {
00139             _data = new double[m][];
00140             _rowCount = m;
00141             _columnCount = m;
00142 
00143             for(int i = 0; i < m; i++)
00144             {
00145                 double[] col = new double[m];
00146                 col[i] = s;
00147                 _data[i] = col;
00148             }
00149 
00150             InitOnDemandComputations();
00151         }
00152 
00159         public
00160         Matrix(
00161             int m,
00162             int n,
00163             double s
00164             )
00165         {
00166             _data = new double[m][];
00167             _rowCount = m;
00168             _columnCount = n;
00169 
00170             for(int i = 0; i < m; i++)
00171             {
00172                 double[] col = new double[n];
00173                 for(int j = 0; j < n; j++)
00174                 {
00175                     col[j] = s;
00176                 }
00177 
00178                 _data[i] = col;
00179             }
00180 
00181             InitOnDemandComputations();
00182         }

00192         public
00193         Matrix(
00194             double[][] A
00195             )
00196         {
00197             _data = A;
00198             GetRowColumnCount(_data, out _rowCount, out _columnCount);
00199 
00200             InitOnDemandComputations();
00201         }

00208         [Obsolete("Use 'Matrix.Create(double[,])' or 'new Matrix(double[][])' instead")]
00209         [CLSCompliant(false)]
00210         public
00211         Matrix(
00212             double[,] A
00213             )
00214         {
00215             _rowCount = A.GetLength(0);
00216             _columnCount = A.GetLength(1);
00217             _data = new double[_rowCount][];
00218 
00219             for(int i = 0; i < _rowCount; i++)
00220             {
00221                 double[] col = new double[_columnCount];
00222                 for(int j = 0; j < _columnCount; j++)
00223                 {
00224                     col[j] = A[i, j];
00225                 }
00226 
00227                 _data[i] = col;
00228             }
00229 
00230             InitOnDemandComputations();
00231         }
00232 
00239         public
00240         Matrix(
00241             double[] vals,
00242             int m
00243             )
00244         {
00245             _rowCount = m;
00246             if(m == 0)
00247             {
00248                 _columnCount = 0;
00249                 if(vals.Length != 0)
00250                 {
00251                     throw new ArgumentException(string.Format(Resources.ArgumentVectorLengthsMultipleOf, "m"));
00252                 }
00253             }
00254             else
00255             {
00256                 int rem;
00257                 _columnCount = Math.DivRem(vals.Length, m, out rem);
00258                 if(rem != 0)
00259                 {
00260                     throw new ArgumentException(string.Format(Resources.ArgumentVectorLengthsMultipleOf, "m"));
00261                 }
00262             }
00263 
00264             _data = new double[_rowCount][];
00265             for(int i = 0; i < _rowCount; i++)
00266             {
00267                 double[] col = new double[_columnCount];
00268                 for(int j = 0; j < _columnCount; j++)
00269                 {
00270                     col[j] = vals[i + j * _rowCount];
00271                 }
00272 
00273                 _data[i] = col;
00274             }
00275 
00276             InitOnDemandComputations();
00277         }
00278 
00283         public static
00284         Matrix
00285         Create(
00286             double[][] A
00287             )
00288         {
00289             return new Matrix(CloneMatrixData(A));
00290         }
00291 
00296         [CLSCompliant(false)]
00297         public static
00298         Matrix
00299         Create(
00300             double[,] A
00301             )
00302         {
00303             int rows = A.GetLength(0);
00304             int columns = A.GetLength(1);
00305             double[][] newData = new double[rows][];
00306 
00307             for(int i = 0; i < rows; i++)
00308             {
00309                 double[] col = new double[columns];
00310                 for(int j = 0; j < columns; j++)
00311                 {
00312                     col[j] = A[i, j];
00313                 }
00314 
00315                 newData[i] = col;
00316             }
00317 
00318             return new Matrix(newData);
00319         }
00320 
00324         public static
00325         Matrix
00326         CreateFromColumns(
00327             IList<Vector> columnVectors
00328             )
00329         {
00330             if(null == columnVectors)
00331             {
00332                 throw new ArgumentNullException("columnVectors");
00333             }
00334 
00335             if(0 == columnVectors.Count)
00336             {
00337                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("columnVectors");
00338             }
00339 
00340             int rows = columnVectors[0].Length;
00341             int columns = columnVectors.Count;
00342             double[][] newData = new double[rows][];
00343 
00344             for(int i = 0; i < rows; i++)
00345             {
00346                 double[] newRow = new double[columns];
00347                 for(int j = 0; j < columns; j++)
00348                 {
00349                     newRow[j] = columnVectors[j][i];
00350                 }
00351 
00352                 newData[i] = newRow;
00353             }
00354 
00355             return new Matrix(newData);
00356         }
00357 
00361         public static
00362         Matrix
00363         CreateFromRows(
00364             IList<Vector> rowVectors
00365             )
00366         {
00367             if(null == rowVectors)
00368             {
00369                 throw new ArgumentNullException("columnVectors");
00370             }
00371 
00372             if(0 == rowVectors.Count)
00373             {
00374                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("columnVectors");
00375             }
00376 
00377             int rows = rowVectors.Count;
00378             int columns = rowVectors[0].Length;
00379             double[][] newData = new double[rows][];
00380 
00381             for(int i = 0; i < rows; i++)
00382             {
00383                 newData[i] = rowVectors[i].CopyToArray();
00384             }
00385 
00386             return new Matrix(newData);
00387         }
00388 
00395         public static
00396         Matrix
00397         Identity(
00398             int m,
00399             int n
00400             )
00401         {
00402             double[][] data = new double[m][];
00403             for(int i = 0; i < m; i++)
00404             {
00405                 double[] col = new double[n];
00406                 if(i < n)
00407                 {
00408                     col[i] = 1.0;
00409                 }
00410 
00411                 data[i] = col;
00412             }
00413 
00414             return new Matrix(data);
00415         }

00422         Matrix
00423         Ones(
00424             int m

00427             return new Matrix(m, m, 1.0);

00452         public static
00453         Matrix
00454         Diagonal(
00455             IVector<double> diagonalVector,
00456             int m,
00457             int n
00458             )
00459         {
00460             double[][] data = new double[m][];
00461             for(int i = 0; i < m; i++)
00462             {
00463                 double[] col = new double[n];
00464                 if((i < n) && (i < diagonalVector.Length))
00465                 {
00466                     col[i] = diagonalVector[i];
00467                 }
00468 
00469                 data[i] = col;
00470             }
00471 
00472             return new Matrix(data);
00473         }
00474 
00482         public static
00483         Matrix
00484         Diagonal(
00485             IVector<double> diagonalVector
00486             )
00487         {
00488             return Diagonal(diagonalVector, diagonalVector.Length, diagonalVector.Length);
00489         }

00498         public static
00499         Matrix
00500         Random(
00501             int m,
00502             int n,
00503             IContinuousGenerator randomDistribution
00504             )
00505         {
00506             double[][] data = new double[m][];
00507             for(int i = 0; i < m; i++)
00508             {
00509                 double[] col = new double[n];
00510                 for(int j = 0; j < n; j++)
00511                 {
00512                     col[j] = randomDistribution.NextDouble();
00513                 }
00514 
00515                 data[i] = col;
00516             }
00517 
00518             return new Matrix(data);
00519         }

00541 
00545         public
00546         double[,]
00547         CopyToArray()
00548         {
00549             double[,] newData = new double[_rowCount, _columnCount];
00550             for(int i = 0; i < _rowCount; i++)
00551             {
00552                 for(int j = 0; j < _columnCount; j++)
00553                 {
00554                     newData[i, j] = _data[i][j];
00555                 }
00556             }
00557 
00558             return newData;
00559         }
00560 
00565         public
00566         double[][]
00567         CopyToJaggedArray()
00568         {
00569             return CloneMatrixData(_data);
00570         }

00600 
00605         public static explicit
00606         operator double[](
00607             Matrix m
00608             )
00609         {
00610             if(m.ColumnCount != 1)
00611             {
00612                 throw new InvalidOperationException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixSingleColumn);
00613             }
00614 
00615             double[] array = new double[m.RowCount];
00616             for(int i = 0; i < m.RowCount; i++)
00617             {
00618                 array[i] = m[i, 0];
00619             }
00620 
00621             return array;
00622         }
00623 
00628         public static explicit
00629         operator double(
00630             Matrix m
00631             )
00632         {
00633             if(m.ColumnCount != 1 || m.RowCount != 1)
00634             {
00635                 throw new InvalidOperationException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixSingleColumnRow);
00636             }
00637 
00638             return m[0, 0];
00639         }

00642         #region Internal Data Stucture

00651         public static
00652         double[][]
00653         CreateMatrixData(
00654             int m,
00655             int n
00656             )
00657         {
00658             double[][] data = new double[m][];
00659             for(int i = 0; i < m; i++)
00660             {
00661                 data[i] = new double[n];
00662             }
00663 
00664             return data;
00665         }
00666 
00670         public static
00671         double[][]
00672         CloneMatrixData(
00673             double[][] data
00674             )
00675         {
00676             int rows, columns;
00677             GetRowColumnCount(data, out rows, out columns);
00678             double[][] newData = new double[rows][];
00679             for(int i = 0; i < rows; i++)
00680             {
00681                 double[] col = new double[columns];
00682                 for(int j = 0; j < columns; j++)
00683                 {
00684                     col[j] = data[i][j];
00685                 }
00686 
00687                 newData[i] = col;
00688             }
00689 
00690             return newData;
00691         }
00692 
00696         public static
00697         void
00698         GetRowColumnCount(
00699             double[][] data,
00700             out int rows,
00701             out int columns
00702             )
00703         {
00704             rows = data.Length;
00705             columns = (rows == 0) ? 0 : data[0].Length;
00706         }

00710         #region Sub-matrices operation
00711 
00715         public
00716         Vector
00717         GetColumnVector(
00718             int columnIndex
00719             )
00720         {
00721             if(columnIndex < 0 || columnIndex >= _columnCount)
00722             {
00723                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("columnIndex");
00724             }
00725 
00726             double[] newData = new double[_rowCount];
00727 
00728             for(int i = 0; i < _rowCount; i++)
00729             {
00730                 newData[i] = _data[i][columnIndex];
00731             }
00732 
00733             return new Vector(newData);
00734         }
00735 
00739         public
00740         Vector
00741         GetRowVector(
00742             int rowIndex
00743             )
00744         {
00745             if(rowIndex < 0 || rowIndex >= _rowCount)
00746             {
00747                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("rowIndexs");
00748             }
00749 
00750             double[] newData = new double[_columnCount];
00751             _data[rowIndex].CopyTo(newData, 0);
00752 
00753             return new Vector(newData);
00754         }
00755 
00759         public
00760         void
00761         SetColumnVector(
00762             IVector<double> columnVector,
00763             int columnIndex
00764             )
00765         {
00766             if(null == columnVector)
00767             {
00768                 throw new ArgumentNullException("columnVector");
00769             }
00770 
00771             if(columnIndex < 0 || columnIndex >= _columnCount)
00772             {
00773                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("columnIndex");
00774             }
00775 
00776             if(columnVector.Length != _rowCount)
00777             {
00778                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("columnVector");
00779             }
00780 
00781             for(int i = 0; i < _rowCount; i++)
00782             {
00783                 _data[i][columnIndex] = columnVector[i];
00784             }
00785 
00786             ResetOnDemandComputations();
00787         }
00788 
00792         public
00793         void
00794         SetRowVector(
00795             IVector<double> rowVector,
00796             int rowIndex
00797             )
00798         {
00799             if(null == rowVector)
00800             {
00801                 throw new ArgumentNullException("rowVector");
00802             }
00803 
00804             if(rowIndex < 0 || rowIndex >= _rowCount)
00805             {
00806                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("rowIndexs");
00807             }
00808 
00809             if(rowVector.Length != _columnCount)
00810             {
00811                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("rowVector");
00812             }
00813 
00814             _data[rowIndex] = rowVector.CopyToArray();
00815 
00816             ResetOnDemandComputations();
00817         }
00818 
00828         public virtual
00829         Matrix
00830         GetMatrix(
00831             int i0,
00832             int i1,
00833             int j0,
00834             int j1
00835             )
00836         {
00837             double[][] newData = CreateMatrixData(i1 - i0 + 1, j1 - j0 + 1);
00838             try
00839             {
00840                 for(int i = i0; i <= i1; i++)
00841                 {
00842                     for(int j = j0; j <= j1; j++)
00843                     {
00844                         newData[i - i0][j - j0] = _data[i][j];
00845                     }
00846                 }
00847             }
00848             catch(IndexOutOfRangeException e)
00849             {
00850                 throw new IndexOutOfRangeException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixIndexOutOfRange, e);
00851             }
00852 
00853             return new Matrix(newData);
00854         }
00855 
00863         public virtual
00864         Matrix
00865         GetMatrix(
00866             int[] r,
00867             int[] c
00868             )
00869         {
00870             double[][] newData = CreateMatrixData(r.Length, c.Length);
00871             try
00872             {
00873                 for(int i = 0; i < r.Length; i++)
00874                 {
00875                     for(int j = 0; j < c.Length; j++)
00876                     {
00877                         newData[i][j] = _data[r[i]][c[j]];
00878                     }
00879                 }
00880             }
00881             catch(IndexOutOfRangeException e)
00882             {
00883                 throw new IndexOutOfRangeException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixIndexOutOfRange, e);
00884             }
00885 
00886             return new Matrix(newData);
00887         }
00888 
00897         public virtual
00898         Matrix
00899         GetMatrix(
00900             int i0,
00901             int i1,
00902             int[] c
00903             )
00904         {
00905             double[][] newData = CreateMatrixData(i1 - i0 + 1, c.Length);
00906             try
00907             {
00908                 for(int i = i0; i <= i1; i++)
00909                 {
00910                     for(int j = 0; j < c.Length; j++)
00911                     {
00912                         newData[i - i0][j] = _data[i][c[j]];
00913                     }
00914                 }
00915             }
00916             catch(IndexOutOfRangeException e)
00917             {
00918                 throw new IndexOutOfRangeException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixIndexOutOfRange, e);
00919             }
00920 
00921             return new Matrix(newData);
00922         }

00932         public virtual
00933         Matrix
00934         GetMatrix(
00935             int[] r,
00936             int j0,
00937             int j1
00938             )
00939         {
00940             double[][] newData = CreateMatrixData(r.Length, j1 - j0 + 1);
00941             try
00942             {
00943                 for(int i = 0; i < r.Length; i++)
00944                 {
00945                     for(int j = j0; j <= j1; j++)
00946                     {
00947                         newData[i][j - j0] = _data[r[i]][j];
00948                     }
00949                 }
00950             }
00951             catch(IndexOutOfRangeException e)
00952             {
00953                 throw new IndexOutOfRangeException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixIndexOutOfRange, e);
00954             }
00955 
00956             return new Matrix(newData);
00957         }

00968         public virtual
00969         void
00970         SetMatrix(
00971             int i0,
00972             int i1,
00973             int j0,
00974             int j1,
00975             IMatrix<double> X
00976             )
00977         {
00978             try
00979             {
00980                 for(int i = i0; i <= i1; i++)
00981                 {
00982                     for(int j = j0; j <= j1; j++)
00983                     {
00984                         _data[i][j] = X[i - i0, j - j0];
00985                     }
00986                 }
00987             }
00988             catch(IndexOutOfRangeException e)
00989             {
00990                 throw new IndexOutOfRangeException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixIndexOutOfRange, e);
00991             }
00992 
00993             ResetOnDemandComputations();
00994         }

01003         public virtual
01004         void
01005         SetMatrix(
01006             int[] r,
01007             int[] c,
01008             IMatrix<double> X
01009             )
01010         {
01011             try
01012             {
01013                 for(int i = 0; i < r.Length; i++)
01014                 {
01015                     for(int j = 0; j < c.Length; j++)
01016                     {
01017                         _data[r[i]][c[j]] = X[i, j];
01018                     }
01019                 }
01020             }
01021             catch(IndexOutOfRangeException e)
01022             {
01023                 throw new IndexOutOfRangeException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixIndexOutOfRange, e);
01024             }
01025 
01026             ResetOnDemandComputations();
01027         }
01028 
01037         public virtual
01038         void
01039         SetMatrix(
01040             int[] r,
01041             int j0,
01042             int j1,
01043             IMatrix<double> X
01044             )
01045         {
01046             try
01047             {
01048                 for(int i = 0; i < r.Length; i++)
01049                 {
01050                     for(int j = j0; j <= j1; j++)
01051                     {
01052                         _data[r[i]][j] = X[i, j - j0];
01053                     }
01054                 }
01055             }
01056             catch(IndexOutOfRangeException e)
01057             {
01058                 throw new IndexOutOfRangeException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixIndexOutOfRange, e);
01059             }
01060 
01061             ResetOnDemandComputations();
01062         }
01063 
01072         public virtual
01073         void
01074         SetMatrix(
01075             int i0,
01076             int i1,
01077             int[] c,
01078             IMatrix<double> X
01079             )
01080         {
01081             try
01082             {
01083                 for(int i = i0; i <= i1; i++)
01084                 {
01085                     for(int j = 0; j < c.Length; j++)
01086                     {
01087                         _data[i][c[j]] = X[i - i0, j];
01088                     }
01089                 }
01090             }
01091             catch(IndexOutOfRangeException e)
01092             {
01093                 throw new IndexOutOfRangeException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixIndexOutOfRange, e);
01094             }
01095 
01096             ResetOnDemandComputations();
01097         }
01098 
01099         #endregion
01100 
01101         #region Norms computations
01102 
01105         public
01106         double
01107         Norm1()
01108         {
01109             // TODO (cdr, 2008-03-11): Change to property, consider cached on-demand.
01110             double f = 0;
01111             for(int j = 0; j < _columnCount; j++)
01112             {
01113                 double s = 0;
01114                 for(int i = 0; i < _rowCount; i++)
01115                 {
01116                     s += Math.Abs(_data[i][j]);
01117                 }
01118 
01119                 f = Math.Max(f, s);
01120             }
01121 
01122             return f;
01123         }
01124 
01127         public
01128         double
01129         Norm2()
01130         {
01131             // TODO (cdr, 2008-03-11): Change to property.
01132             return SingularValueDecomposition.Norm2();
01133         }
01134 
01137         public
01138         double
01139         NormInf()
01140         {
01141             // TODO (cdr, 2008-03-11): Change to property, consider cached on-demand.
01142             double f = 0;
01143             for(int i = 0; i < _rowCount; i++)
01144             {
01145                 double s = 0;
01146                 for(int j = 0; j < _columnCount; j++)
01147                 {
01148                     s += Math.Abs(_data[i][j]);
01149                 }
01150 
01151                 f = Math.Max(f, s);
01152             }
01153 
01154             return f;
01155         }
01156 
01159         public
01160         double
01161         NormF()
01162         {
01163             // TODO (cdr, 2008-03-11): Change to property
01164             double f = 0;
01165             for(int i = 0; i < _rowCount; i++)
01166             {
01167                 for(int j = 0; j < _columnCount; j++)
01168                 {
01169                     f = Fn.Hypot(f, _data[i][j]);
01170                 }
01171             }
01172 
01173             return f;
01174         }
01175

01177         #endregion
01178 
01179         #region Elementary linear operations
01180 
01181         // TODO: Adapt to new method model (X + XInplace). Will be a breaking change.
01182         // TODO: Extend with additional methods, see ComplexMatrix.
01183 
01188         public virtual
01189         void
01190         Add(
01191             IMatrix<double> m
01192             )
01193         {
01194             CheckMatchingMatrixDimensions(this, m);
01195 
01196             for(int i = 0; i < _rowCount; i++)
01197             {
01198                 for(int j = 0; j < _columnCount; j++)
01199                 {
01200                     _data[i][j] += m[i, j];
01201                 }
01202             }
01203 
01204             ResetOnDemandComputations();
01205         }
01206 
01211         public virtual
01212         void
01213         Multiply(
01214             double s
01215             )
01216         {
01217             for(int i = 0; i < _rowCount; i++)
01218             {
01219                 for(int j = 0; j < _columnCount; j++)
01220                 {
01221                     _data[i][j] *= s;
01222                 }
01223             }
01224 
01225             ResetOnDemandComputations();
01226         }
01227 
01235         public virtual
01236         void
01237         Multiply(
01238             double[] diagonal
01239             )
01240         {
01241             if(diagonal == null)
01242             {
01243                 throw new ArgumentNullException("diagonal", string.Format(Resources.ArgumentNull, "diagonal"));
01244             }
01245 
01246             if(diagonal.Length != _rowCount)
01247             {
01248                 throw new ArgumentException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixSameDimensions);
01249             }
01250 
01251             for(int i = 0; i < _rowCount; i++)
01252             {
01253                 double d = diagonal[i];
01254                 for(int j = 0; j < _columnCount; j++)
01255                 {
01256                     _data[i][j] *= d;
01257                 }
01258             }
01259 
01260             ResetOnDemandComputations();
01261         }
01262 
01268         public
01269         Matrix
01270         Multiply(
01271             Matrix B
01272             )
01273         {
01274             if(B == null)
01275             {
01276                 throw new ArgumentNullException("B", string.Format(Resources.ArgumentNull, "B"));
01277             }
01278 
01279             if(B.RowCount != _columnCount)
01280             {
01281                 throw new ArgumentException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixSameDimensions);
01282             }
01283 
01284             double[][] newData = CreateMatrixData(_rowCount, B.ColumnCount);
01285 
01286             for(int j = 0; j < B.ColumnCount; j++)
01287             {
01288                 // caching the column for performance
01289                 double[] columnB = new double[_columnCount];
01290                 for(int k = 0; k < _columnCount; k++)
01291                 {
01292                     columnB[k] = B._data[k][j];
01293                 }
01294 
01295                 // making the line-to-column product
01296                 for(int i = 0; i < _rowCount; i++)
01297                 {
01298                     double s = 0;
01299 
01300                     for(int k = 0; k < _columnCount; k++)
01301                     {
01302                         s += _data[i][k] * columnB[k];
01303                     }
01304 
01305                     newData[i][j] = s;
01306                 }
01307             }
01308 
01309             return new Matrix(newData);
01310         }
01311 
01316         public virtual
01317         void
01318         Subtract(
01319             IMatrix<double> m
01320             )
01321         {
01322             CheckMatchingMatrixDimensions(this, m);
01323 
01324             for(int i = 0; i < _rowCount; i++)
01325             {
01326                 for(int j = 0; j < _columnCount; j++)
01327                 {
01328                     _data[i][j] -= m[i, j];
01329                 }
01330             }
01331 
01332             ResetOnDemandComputations();
01333         }
01334 
01338         public virtual
01339         void
01340         UnaryMinus()
01341         {
01342             for(int i = 0; i < _rowCount; i++)
01343             {
01344                 for(int j = 0; j < _columnCount; j++)
01345                 {
01346                     _data[i][j] = -_data[i][j];
01347                 }
01348             }
01349 
01350             ResetOnDemandComputations();
01351         }
01352 
01353         #endregion
01354 
01355         #region Additional elementary operations
01356 
01365         public virtual
01366         void
01367         Transpose()
01368         {
01369             // TODO: test this method
01370             int m = _rowCount;
01371             int n = _columnCount;
01372 
01373             if(m == n)
01374             {
01375                 // No need for array copy
01376                 for(int i = 0; i < m; i++)
01377                 {
01378                     for(int j = i + 1; j < n; j++)
01379                     {
01380                         double thisIJ = this[i, j];
01381                         _data[i][j] = _data[j][i];
01382                         _data[j][i] = thisIJ;
01383                     }
01384                 }
01385             }
01386             else
01387             {
01388                 double[][] newData = CreateMatrixData(n, m);
01389                 for(int i = 0; i < m; i++)
01390                 {
01391                     for(int j = 0; j < n; j++)
01392                     {
01393                         newData[j][i] = _data[i][j];
01394                     }
01395                 }
01396 
01397                 _data = newData;
01398                 _rowCount = n;
01399                 _columnCount = m;
01400             }
01401 
01402             ResetOnDemandComputations();
01403         }
01404 
01406         public static
01407         Matrix
01408         Transpose(
01409             IMatrix<double> m
01410             )
01411         {
01412             double[][] newData = CreateMatrixData(m.ColumnCount, m.RowCount);
01413             for(int i = 0; i < m.RowCount; i++)
01414             {
01415                 for(int j = 0; j < m.ColumnCount; j++)
01416                 {
01417                     newData[j][i] = m[i, j];
01418                 }
01419             }
01420 
01421             return new Matrix(newData);
01422         }
01423 
01425         public static
01426         Matrix
01427         KroneckerProduct(
01428             Matrix A,
01429             Matrix B
01430             )
01431         {
01432             // Matrix to be created
01433             Matrix outMat = new Matrix(A.RowCount * B.RowCount, A.ColumnCount * B.ColumnCount);
01434             double[][] Adata = A._data;
01435 
01436             for(int i = 0; i < A.RowCount; i++)
01437             {
01438                 int rowOffset = i * B.RowCount;
01439                 for(int j = 0; j < A.ColumnCount; j++)
01440                 {
01441                     int colOffset = j * B.ColumnCount;
01442                     Matrix partMat = Adata[i][j] * B;
01443 
01444                     outMat.SetMatrix(
01445                         rowOffset,
01446                         rowOffset + B.RowCount - 1,
01447                         colOffset,
01448                         colOffset + B.RowCount - 1,
01449                         partMat
01450                         );
01451                 }
01452             }
01453 
01454             return outMat;
01455         }
01456 
01460         public
01461         Matrix
01462         TensorMultiply(
01463             Matrix B
01464             )
01465         {
01466             return KroneckerProduct(this, B);
01467         }

01780 
01781         #region Linear Algebra
01782 
01787         public virtual
01788         Matrix
01789         Solve(
01790             Matrix B
01791             )
01792         {
01793             // square case:
01794             if(_rowCount == _columnCount)
01795             {
01796                 return LUDecomposition.Solve(B);
01797             }
01798 
01799             // m > n:
01800             if(_rowCount > _columnCount)
01801             {
01802                 return QRDecomposition.Solve(B);
01803             }
01804 
01805             // m < n:
01806             // Here we'd actually need an LQ decomposition instead of QR.
01807             // Unfortunately we don't support that yet.
01808 
01809             throw new NotSupportedException(Properties.Resources.SpecialCasePlannedButNotImplementedYet);
01810         }
01811 
01816         public virtual
01817         Matrix
01818         SolveRobust(
01819             Matrix B
01820             )
01821         {
01822             if(_rowCount == _columnCount)
01823             {
01824                 return LUDecomposition.Solve(B);
01825             }
01826 
01827             double eta = 1.0e-12; // cut-off value to avoid instabilities in the IRLS convergence
01828             double epsilon = 1.0e-6; // convergence threshold to stop the iteration
01829             int maxIteration = 100;
01830 
01831             Matrix A = this;
01832             Matrix tA = Matrix.Transpose(this);
01833             Matrix X = null;
01834 
01835             // G is a diagonal matrix - G is initialized as the identity matrix
01836             double[] G = new double[A.RowCount];
01837             for(int i = 0; i < G.Length; i++)
01838             {
01839                 G[i] = 1;
01840             }
01841 
01842             // IRLS loop
01843             double maxChange = double.MaxValue;
01844             for(int k = 0; k < maxIteration && maxChange > epsilon; k++)
01845             {
01846                 Matrix GA = this.Clone();
01847                 GA.Multiply(G);
01848 
01849                 Matrix GB = B.Clone();
01850                 GB.Multiply(G);
01851 
01852                 Matrix Ak = tA.Multiply(GA);
01853                 Matrix Bk = tA.Multiply(GB);
01854 
01855                 Matrix Xk = Ak.Solve(Bk);
01856                 if(X != null)
01857                 {
01858                     maxChange = double.MinValue;
01859                     for(int i = 0; i < X.RowCount; i++)
01860                     {
01861                         maxChange = Math.Max(maxChange, Math.Abs(X[i, 0] - Xk[i, 0]));
01862                     }
01863                 }
01864 
01865                 X = Xk;
01866 
01867                 Matrix Rk = A.Multiply(Xk);
01868                 Rk.UnaryMinus();
01869                 Rk.Add(B);
01870 
01871                 // updating the weighting matrix
01872                 for(int i = 0; i < B.RowCount; i++)
01873                 {
01874                     double r = Math.Abs(Rk[i, 0]);
01875                     if(r < eta)
01876                     {
01877                         r = eta;
01878                     }
01879 
01880                     G[i] = 1.0 / r;
01881                 }
01882             }
01883 
01884             return X;
01885         }
01886 
01890         public virtual
01891         Matrix
01892         SolveTranspose(
01893             Matrix B
01894             )
01895         {
01896             return Transpose(this).Solve(Transpose(B));
01897         }
01898 
01901         public virtual
01902         Matrix
01903         Inverse()
01904         {
01905             // m >= n:
01906             if(_rowCount >= _columnCount)
01907             {
01908                 return Solve(Identity(_rowCount, _rowCount));
01909             }
01910 
01911             // m < n:
01912             // Here we'd actually need an LQ decomposition instead of QR.
01913             // Unfortunately we don't support that yet.
01914             // Lukily there is a transpose identity for the inverse:
01915 
01916             Matrix AT = Transpose(this);
01917             Matrix BT = Identity(_columnCount, _columnCount);
01918             Matrix RT = AT.QRDecomposition.Solve(BT);
01919             return Transpose(RT);
01920         }
01921 
01923         public virtual
01924         double
01925         Determinant()
01926         {
01927             // TODO (cdr, 2008-03-11): Change to property
01928             return LUDecomposition.Determinant();
01929         }
01930

01934         int

01938             return SingularValueDecomposition.Rank();
01939         }
01940

01944         double

01948             return SingularValueDecomposition.Condition();
01949         }

01985         #region Arithmetic Operator Overloading
01986 
01988         public static
01989         Matrix
01990         operator +(
01991             Matrix m1,
01992             Matrix m2
01993             )
01994         {
01995             CheckMatchingMatrixDimensions(m1, m2);
01996 
01997             double[][] newData = CreateMatrixData(m1.RowCount, m1.ColumnCount);
01998             for(int i = 0; i < m1.RowCount; i++)
01999             {
02000                 for(int j = 0; j < m1.ColumnCount; j++)
02001                 {
02002                     newData[i][j] = m1[i, j] + m2[i, j];
02003                 }
02004             }
02005 
02006             return new Matrix(newData);
02007         }
02008 
02010         public static
02011         Matrix
02012         operator -(
02013             Matrix m1,
02014             Matrix m2
02015             )
02016         {
02017             CheckMatchingMatrixDimensions(m1, m2);
02018 
02019             double[][] newData = CreateMatrixData(m1.RowCount, m1.ColumnCount);
02020             for(int i = 0; i < m1.RowCount; i++)
02021             {
02022                 for(int j = 0; j < m1.ColumnCount; j++)
02023                 {
02024                     newData[i][j] = m1[i, j] - m2[i, j];
02025                 }
02026             }
02027 
02028             return new Matrix(newData);
02029         }
02030 
02032         public static
02033         Matrix
02034         operator -(
02035             Matrix m1
02036             )
02037         {
02038             double[][] newData = CreateMatrixData(m1.RowCount, m1.ColumnCount);
02039             for(int i = 0; i < m1.RowCount; i++)
02040             {
02041                 for(int j = 0; j < m1.ColumnCount; j++)
02042                 {
02043                     newData[i][j] = -m1[i, j];
02044                 }
02045             }
02046 
02047             return new Matrix(newData);
02048         }
02049 
02052         public static
02053         Matrix
02054         operator *(
02055             Matrix m1,
02056             Matrix m2
02057             )
02058         {
02059             if(m2.RowCount != m1.ColumnCount)
02060             {
02061                 throw new ArgumentException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixSameDimensions);
02062             }
02063 
02064             double[][] newData = CreateMatrixData(m1.RowCount, m2.ColumnCount);
02065             for(int j = 0; j < m2.ColumnCount; j++)
02066             {
02067                 for(int i = 0; i < m1.RowCount; i++)
02068                 {
02069                     double s = 0;
02070                     for(int k = 0; k < m1.ColumnCount; k++)
02071                     {
02072                         s += m1[i, k] * m2[k, j];
02073                     }
02074 
02075                     newData[i][j] = s;
02076                 }
02077             }
02078 
02079             return new Matrix(newData);
02080         }
02081 
02083         public static
02084         Matrix
02085         operator *(
02086             double s,
02087             Matrix m
02088             )
02089         {
02090             double[][] newData = CreateMatrixData(m.RowCount, m.ColumnCount);
02091             for(int i = 0; i < m.RowCount; i++)
02092             {
02093                 for(int j = 0; j < m.ColumnCount; j++)
02094                 {
02095                     newData[i][j] = s * m[i, j];
02096                 }
02097             }
02098 
02099             return new Matrix(newData);
02100         }
02101 
02103         public static
02104         Matrix
02105         operator *(
02106             Matrix m,
02107             double s
02108             )
02109         {
02110             return s * m;
02111         }
02112 
02113         #endregion   //Operator Overloading
02114 
02115         #region Various Helpers & Infrastructure
02116 
02118         private static
02119         void
02120         CheckMatchingMatrixDimensions(
02121             IMatrix<double> A,
02122             IMatrix<double> B
02123             )
02124         {
02125             if(A.RowCount != B.RowCount || A.ColumnCount != B.ColumnCount)
02126             {
02127                 throw new ArgumentException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixSameDimensions);
02128             }
02129         }
02130 
02132         public
02133         Matrix
02134         Clone()
02135         {
02136             return new Matrix(CloneMatrixData(_data));
02137         }
02138 
02142         object
02143         ICloneable.Clone()
02144         {
02145             return Clone();
02146         }
02147 
02151         public static
02152         bool
02153         AlmostEqual(
02154             Matrix X,
02155             Matrix Y,
02156             double relativeAccuracy
02157             )
02158         {
02159             return Number.AlmostEqualNorm(X.Norm1(), Y.Norm1(), (X - Y).Norm1(), relativeAccuracy);
02160         }
02161 
02165         public static
02166         bool
02167         AlmostEqual(
02168             Matrix X,
02169             Matrix Y
02170             )
02171         {
02172             return Number.AlmostEqualNorm(X.Norm1(), Y.Norm1(), (X - Y).Norm1(), 10 * Number.DefaultRelativeAccuracy);
02173         }
02174 
02178         public override
02179         string
02180         ToString()
02181         {
02182             StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
02183             for(int i = 0; i < _rowCount; i++)
02184             {
02185                 if(i == 0)
02186                 {
02187                     sb.Append("[[");
02188                 }
02189                 else
02190                 {
02191                     sb.Append(" [");
02192                 }
02193 
02194                 for(int j = 0; j < _columnCount; j++)
02195                 {
02196                     if(j != 0)
02197                     {
02198                         sb.Append(',');
02199                     }
02200 
02201                     sb.Append(_data[i][j]);
02202                 }
02203 
02204                 if(i == _rowCount - 1)
02205                 {
02206                     sb.Append("]]");
02207                 }
02208                 else
02209                 {
02210                     sb.AppendLine("]");
02211                 }
02212             }
02213 
02214             return sb.ToString();
02215         }
02216 
02217         #endregion
02218 
02219         #region OnDemandComputations
02220         void
02221         InitOnDemandComputations()
02222         {
02223             _luDecompositionOnDemand = new OnDemandComputation<LUDecomposition>(ComputeLUDecomposition);
02224             _qrDecompositionOnDemand = new OnDemandComputation<QRDecomposition>(ComputeQRDecomposition);
02225             _choleskyDecompositionOnDemand = new OnDemandComputation<CholeskyDecomposition>(ComputeCholeskyDecomposition);
02226             _singularValueDecompositionOnDemand = new OnDemandComputation<SingularValueDecomposition>(ComputeSingularValueDecomposition);
02227             _eigenValueDecompositionOnDemand = new OnDemandComputation<EigenvalueDecomposition>(ComputeEigenValueDecomposition);
02228             _traceOnDemand = new OnDemandComputation<double>(ComputeTrace);
02229         }
02230 
02231         void
02232         ResetOnDemandComputations()
02233         {
02234             _luDecompositionOnDemand.Reset();
02235             _qrDecompositionOnDemand.Reset();
02236             _choleskyDecompositionOnDemand.Reset();
02237             _singularValueDecompositionOnDemand.Reset();
02238             _eigenValueDecompositionOnDemand.Reset();
02239             _traceOnDemand.Reset();
02240         }
02241 
02247         public
02248         void
02249         ResetComputations()
02250         {
02251             ResetOnDemandComputations();
02252         }
02253 
02254         LUDecomposition
02255         ComputeLUDecomposition()
02256         {
02257             return new LUDecomposition(this);
02258         }
02259 
02260         QRDecomposition
02261         ComputeQRDecomposition()
02262         {
02263             return new QRDecomposition(this);
02264         }
02265 
02266         CholeskyDecomposition
02267         ComputeCholeskyDecomposition()
02268         {
02269             return new CholeskyDecomposition(this);
02270         }
02271 
02272         SingularValueDecomposition
02273         ComputeSingularValueDecomposition()
02274         {
02275             return new SingularValueDecomposition(this);
02276         }
02277 
02278         EigenvalueDecomposition
02279         ComputeEigenValueDecomposition()
02280         {
02281             return new EigenvalueDecomposition(this);
02282         }
02283 
02284         double
02285         ComputeTrace()
02286         {
02287             double t = 0;
02288             for(int i = 0; i < Math.Min(_rowCount, _columnCount); i++)
02289             {
02290                 t += _data[i][i];
02291             }
02292 
02293             return t;
02294         }

02296     }
